Question: AsiaRF Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AsiaRF Co., Ltd

Product: Enterprise IoT gateway AP7622

- Compatible with Wi-Fi HaLow, Wi-Fi 6E, and 5G/LTE
- Features advanced Wi-Fi HaLow IoT solutions
- Includes Wi-Fi HaLow wearable gateway ARFHL-UM, Outdoor CPE ARFHL-OD, and IP Camera series
- Demonstrates long range, power efficiency, and reliable connectivity
- Wi-Fi 6E AX3000 module AW7916-NPD certified by FCC and international safety bodies
- Pioneering Wi-Fi 7 module featuring MediaTek MT7996
- Offers OEM and ODM services
- AsiaRF has been a leading provider of wireless connectivity solutions since 1996

For more information, visit AsiaRF Official Website: https://www.asiarf.com/
Summary_cn:
亚洲无线射频有限公司

产品：企业物联网网关 AP7622

- 兼容 Wi-Fi HaLow、Wi-Fi 6E 和5G/LTE
- 提供先进的 Wi-Fi HaLow 物联网解决方案
- 包括 Wi-Fi HaLow 可穿戴网关 ARFHL-UM、户外无线 CPE ARFHL-OD 和 IP 摄像头系列
- 具备远距离、高能效和可靠连接特点
- Wi-Fi 6E AX3000 模块 AW7916-NPD 获得 FCC 和国际安全认证
- 先驱性的 Wi-Fi 7 模块采用 MediaTek MT7996
- 提供 OEM 和 ODM 服务
- 亚洲无线射频自 1996 年以来一直是无线连接解决方案的领先供应商

欲了解更多信息，请访问亚洲无线射频官方网站：https://www.asiarf.com/
